name: DareorTruth
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dare or truth
des: Let's play truth or dare with Alexa! Alexa will ask you, "Truth or Dare?" You pick one of those two options, and then Alexa will give you a truth or dare, depending on which choice you chose. You should just be honest and answer the question and/or do the dare, or else the game won't be fun. :(
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
